description: Lemon, parmesan and parsley crust make this easy roasted salmon dish extra delicious.
name: Parsley, Lemon & Parmesan Crusted Salmon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lettuce leaves in a large bowl and add the remaining oil and lemon juice. Toss well and serve with the salmon.
